dating.remarks: [Joconde. Database of the collections of the state museums of France; http://www.culture.gouv.fr/public/mistral/joconde_fr, accessed 8 Sept 2017]

pageContext.description:
The painting depicts a half-length portrait of a woman, facing left in front of a curtain that reveals a view through a window of a landscape, including a settlement on a rocky outcrop. Her dark dress with the letters 'WAW' embroidered in white on the cuffs suggests her middle-class origin. Her hair is covered by head attire, which recalls a wreath of flowers and is also embroidered with letters on the band ('A.D.O.R.O'). This may have been a marriage portrait and might have had a male companion piece.  
[Görres, cda 2017]
